# Resources

## Setting up your Mac

A script has been prepared for the Campus which will set up MacOS machines with
the necessary tools to start in data science. Obtain the content of
the [repository](https://github.com/nathaneastwood/brew-ds) and then follow the
instructions in README.md to install the packages.

You may also wish to join the Data Science
Campus [github organisation](https://github.com/datasciencecampus)
